entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late this afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 15 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Light snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow beginning this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Light snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 6. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Monday 30 January 2023
